item.title: Msql Server on Linux
item.description: Using MSQL-SERVER on Linux Installation yay -S mssql-server msodbcsql mssql-tools azuredatastudio Configuration sudo /opt/mssql/bin/mssql-conf setup Running a graphical administration application $ azuredatastudio
